column4: the subject for this irc-channel have the text "Flash plugin installation is currently broken. This is due to adobe changing the tar file that the package downloads"... so how do I unbreak it? that is, make flash work?
You wait until the package is fixed.
about updating, there should be support in the long-time-support -versions of ubuntu to update directly between them, right?
Yes, Hardy is being designed to allow an upgrade straight from Dapper.
